data.text:
[[File:|link=]]

Episode 24 is an episode in the Yo-Kai Watch anime series.

Summary[]

Komasan learns that the manga artist wants to write a manga on yōkai, and Komasan becomes conflicted if he should help her obtain the realism she wants. Keita discovers his friends are possessed by the Yo-Kai NEkurama Tengu when the become gloomy out of nowhere. And Whisper praises the real Yo-Kai Tengu, who he claims is a close friend, until they find him.

Episode Structure[]
